title: A Demonstration of R Packages
A Demonstration of R Packages
text: basic example shows solve common problem: use code like …  ’ll still need render README.Rmd regularly, keep README.md --date. devtools::build_readme() handy . also use GitHub Actions re-render README.Rmd every time push. example workflow can found : https://github.com/r-lib/actions/tree/v1/examples. can also embed plots, example:  case, don’t forget commit push resulting figure files, display GitHub CRAN.
